com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles

Class TemplateLabelStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles.AbstractTemplateStyle<ILabel>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles.TemplateLabelStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILabelStyle, ICloneable, Cloneable

    public class TemplateLabelStyle
extends AbstractTemplateStyle<ILabel>
implements ILabelStyle
    An ILabelStyle implementation that can render complex Nodes for the visualization of ILabels using TemplateLabelStyleRenderer.

    The StyleResourceKey is used to determine the Style that will be applied to the Node. The style will be looked-up from the CanvasControl the style is used in.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemplateLabelStyle()
      Creates a new instance with no style resource key and TemplateLabelStyleRenderer as renderer.

      Creates a new instance using the given resource key and TemplateLabelStyleRenderer as renderer.
      TemplateLabelStyle(String styleResourceKey, TemplateLabelStyleRenderer renderer)
      Creates a new instance using the given resource key and a custom renderer instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createControl

        public Node createControl(IRenderContext context,
                          ILabel label)
        Factory method that is called by the TemplateLabelStyleRenderer to create the control that will be used for the display of the label.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the control should be created.
        label - The label that will be rendered.
        Returns:
        The readily styled control.

      • getNormalizedOutline

        public final GeneralPath getNormalizedOutline()
        Gets the normalized outline of a label that will be displayed using the created control.

        The shape will automatically arranged and transformed to have the bounds of the label. This shape will be used to satisfy requests to IMarqueeTestable.isInBox(com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.RectD) and IHitTestable.isHit(com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD) and may be left null to indicate default (rectangular) behavior.

        The default value is null.

        Returns:
        The NormalizedOutline.
        See Also:
        setNormalizedOutline(GeneralPath)

      • getPreferredSize

        public SizeD getPreferredSize(IRenderContext context,
                              ILabel label)
        Convenience method that determines the preferred size of the label if this style was applied.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the size should be calculated.
        label - The label to determine the preferred size of.
        Returns:
        The preferred size.

      • getRenderer

        public final TemplateLabelStyleRenderer getRenderer()
        Description copied from interface: ILabelStyle
        Gets the renderer implementation that can be queried for implementations that provide details about the visual appearance and visual behavior for a given label and this style instance.

        The idiom for retrieving, e.g. an IVisualCreator implementation for a given style is:

        Specified by:
        getRenderer in interface ILabelStyle
        Returns:
        The Renderer.

      • getStyle

        protected URL getStyle(IRenderContext context,
                       IModelItem label)
        Callback method that determines the URL to the FXML file which encodes the Control.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the style is needed.
        label - The label that will be rendered.
        Returns:
        The style instance or null.

      • getStyleResourceKey

        public final String getStyleResourceKey()
        Gets the String that will be used to look up the URL to the FXML file which encodes the Control.
        Returns:
        The resource key for the style or null in which case the default template will be used.
        See Also:
        setStyleResourceKey(java.lang.String)

      • isAutoFlippingEnabled

        public final boolean isAutoFlippingEnabled()
        Gets a value indicating whether the rendering should automatically be flipped (rotated by 180 degrees) if otherwise it would be rendered upside-down.

        The default value is true.

        Returns:
        true if labels should be flipped automatically; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setAutoFlippingEnabled(boolean)

      • setAutoFlippingEnabled

        public final void setAutoFlippingEnabled(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether the rendering should automatically be flipped (rotated by 180 degrees) if otherwise it would be rendered upside-down.

        The default value is true.

        Parameters:
        value - true if labels should be flipped automatically; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isAutoFlippingEnabled()

      • setNormalizedOutline

        public final void setNormalizedOutline(GeneralPath value)
        Sets the normalized outline of a label that will be displayed using the created control.

        The shape will automatically arranged and transformed to have the bounds of the label. This shape will be used to satisfy requests to IMarqueeTestable.isInBox(com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.RectD) and IHitTestable.isHit(com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD) and may be left null to indicate default (rectangular) behavior.

        The default value is null.

        Parameters:
        value - The NormalizedOutline to set.
        See Also:
        getNormalizedOutline()

      • setStyleResourceKey

        public final void setStyleResourceKey(String value)
        Sets the String that will be used to look up the URL to the FXML file which encodes the Control.

        The default value is null.

        Parameters:
        value - The resource key for the style or null in which case the default template will be used.
        See Also:
        getStyleResourceKey()
